data.text: Umbhalo wosendo lukaJesu Khristu indodana kaDavida, indodana ka-Abhrahama:
U-Abhrahama wayenguyise ka-Isaka,
uJuda uyise kaPherezi loZera, unina owayenguThamari,
uRamu uyise ka-Aminadabi,
uSalimoni uyise kaBhowazi, unina owayenguRahabi,
uJese uyise wenkosi uDavida.
uSolomoni uyise kaRehobhowami,
u-Asa uyise kaJehoshafathi,
u-Uziya uyise kaJothamu,
uHezekhiya uyise kaManase,
uJosiya owayenguyise kaJekhoniya labafowabo ngesikhathi bethunjwe eBhabhiloni.
Emva kokuthunjwa eBhabhiloni:
uZerubhabheli uyise ka-Abhiyudi,
u-Azori uyise kaZadokhi,
u-Elihudi uyise ka-Eliyazari,
uJakhobe uyise kaJosefa, umkaMariya, owazala uJesu obizwa ngokuthi nguKhristu.

Ngokunjalo-ke, kwakulezizukulwane ezilitshumi lane sezizonke kusukela ku-Abhrahama kusiya kuDavida, ezilitshumi lane kusukela kuDavida kusiya ekuthunjweni yiBhabhiloni njalo ezilitshumi lane kusukela ekuthunjweni kusiya kuKhristu.
UJesu Khristu wazalwa kanje: Unina uMariya wayethembise ukuthi uzakwendela kuJosefa kodwa kwathi bengakahlangani wabonakala esezithwele kwenziwe ngoMoya oNgcwele.
Ngoba umkakhe uJosefa wayeyindoda elungileyo emthethweni, njalo engafuni ukumyangisa ebantwini, wacabanga ukumala ngasese.

Uthe esekucabangile lokhu, kwafika kuye ingilosi yeNkosi ephutsheni yathi, “Josefa ndodana kaDavida, ungesabi ukuthatha uMariya ukuba abe ngumkakho ngoba lokhu akhulelwe ngakho kuvela kuMoya oNgcwele.
Uzabeletha indodana ozayetha ibizo uthi nguJesu ngoba uzasindisa abantu bakhe ezonweni zabo.”
Konke lokhu kwenzakala ukuze kugcwaliseke okwatshiwo yiNkosi ngomphrofethi ukuthi:
“Intombi egcweleyo izakhulelwa izale indodana, bayibize ngokuthi ngu-Emanuweli”1.23 U-Isaya 7.14 (okutsho ukuthi, “uNkulunkulu ulathi”).
UJosefa esevukile ebuthongweni wenza lokho ingilosi yeNkosi eyayimlaye khona, wamthatha uMariya waba ngumkakhe.
Kodwa kazange embathe laye waze wabeletha indodana. Wayetha ibizo wathi nguJesu.
